name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 21, a flash flood occurred in Liangshan City, Sichuan Province, causing 6 people to be missing

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 21, Hanfei World City Community in Sanmenxia, Henan Province, had been using temporary water and electricity for many years after the delivery of the houses. It was not connected to the national power grid and the water supply network. The water and electricity were unstable for a long time, and the property management did nothing. After the power outage lasted for nearly 24 hours, angry owners blocked the national highway at the entrance of the community. A large number of police, auxiliary police, and special police came to maintain stability, and conflicts broke out during the period. Several owners were taken away. At present, some buildings in the community have received electricity, and the residents' demands have changed from water and electricity to releasing the people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 20, at the Xizi International Business Center in Ninghai County, Ningbo City, Zhejiang Province, a woman and her mother abandoned their newborn baby in the toilet, saying that they would let the baby die. Later, onlookers asked a doctor to come and save the baby.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: However, the local authorities reported the incident as heartwarming news.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Many friends have contributed this song "TG is a bit sweet" these days.
In fact, this is an old song from five years ago. The video comes from the theme song concert of "Sing a Mountain Song for the Party" held on July 1, 2018 by CCTV Music Channel.
"TG" means "Tugong", which was a nickname for the CCP by the little pinks on the Internet in the early years.

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the renovation project of the old gate of Jiangxi Agricultural University was completed, and the school name "Jiangxi Agricultural University" on the gate was changed back to "Communist Labor University".

Timeline
From 1958 to 1980, the Communist Labor University was established
On November 20, 1980, with the approval of the Jiangxi Provincial Party Committee and the Provincial People's Government, Jiangxi Communist Labor University was renamed Jiangxi Agricultural University.
In the summer vacation of 2023, the No. 1 school gate was rebuilt and the original school name was restored.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Is North Korea's blockade being lifted?
On August 21, flights between China and North Korea resumed.
The spokesperson of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs admitted this at a press conference that day.
On August 17, the BBC reported that passenger traffic on the Yalu River Bridge had also resumed.
